home.title: Welcome to Oniria
home.description: Explore the world of dreams with Oniria.

login.subtitle: We're glad to see you here! Welcome.
login.footer: By logging in or creating an account, you accept the

register.subtitle: Create your account easily and quickly
register.success: Account created successfully. Please check your email to confirm your account.
register.successMessage: You're now part of our community! Now just check your email inbox to verify your account.

historial.title: Explore your Nodes
historial.description: Select from the templates you like best

node.toque: Add your touch to the space
node.acaAparecera: Here will appear the content of the dream...

menu.descriptionPortal: Here you can record your dreams, explore your history, and discover the patterns that inhabit your mind.
menu.descriptPortalPanel: The Dream Portal is the gateway to your inner universe. From here you can record a dream, interpret it, or explore your dream history. Each choice opens a new path within your mind.
menu.oniriaAiFunction: Oniria AI will give you a symbolic interpretation of your dream.
menu.historialDescription: Access your dream journal and explore past interpretations.

monitor.title: Control Center
monitor.description: Adjust application preferences and customize your experience.

items.descPerfil: Manage your profile and personal preferences.

portal.saludoDos: What images remained in your dream?
portal.description: Write freely, without worrying about the order. Oniria will take care of interpreting it.
portal.descriptionPanel: You are in the Dream Journal, the place where your dreams take shape. Every word you write leaves a mark on your inner map, connecting memories, symbols, and emotions. This is your space to record what the subconscious showed you while you slept.
portal.tassSeguro: Are you sure you want to close without saving the interpretation?

panelImage.title: New Feature
panelImage.description: Did you know that our AI now generates an image of the interpretation so that your dreams can come to life even more?
panelImage.imagenTransform: Your interpretation has been transformed into a unique image.
panelImage.imagenVisual: We are creating a visual image of your dream. This may take a moment...
panelImage.tranformacionUnica: Your interpretation has been transformed into a unique visual experience.
